extendedInfo.description: Look up words in a dictionary from a browser or other apps instantly without copy-paste like a real natively integrated dictionary app.Now two ways to use!1. Send/share the selected word(s) to Send To Dictionary.2. (NEW) Clipboard text lookup - copy text from anywhere and select Send To Dictionary from the Notification Bar. Meaning it can now work with apps like iSilo and other apps that don't have send/share function!A dictionary helper app that sends/share any word to ColorDict or GoldenDict for instant lookup.Useful when reading in an app that does not support dictionary lookup directly for example, a web browser.Since this app depends on ColorDict or GoldenDict (offline/online dictionary tools), Internet connection is not required and is very customizable.REQUIRES and currently supports: ColorDict and GoldenDictThanks to OldÅich for letting me know this app works with GoldenDict too.PERMISSION REQUIRED: Run at Startup - To be able to automatically run on boot when clipboard lookup is enabled.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I think you need make this app popup is transparent! Auto open keyboard when open popup. It is usefull for some app can\'t copy word or share word! We still see the work don\'t need to remember word.
reviews.author: \304\220\341\273\251c Nguy\341\273\205n

reviews.title: Definitive Dictionary Assistant
reviews.comment: 5-Stars for excellent execution. Once you have ColorDict and dictionary files installed, it makes it easy to search for a term: anytime & offline. A must have!
reviews.author: Terrence John

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: I like the ideas, but by default, goldendict allow user to look up a word using Send to option. So the first option is rather useless, option 2 seems interesting but how about just copy or select the word, this app activates dictionary automatically? Besides, goldendict does not show up properly
reviews.author: Thanh Nguyen
